OCD.name: Blood Weight Controller
OCD.description: Business logic controller for integrating TruTest scales and Mettler balances for measuring animal blood weights as a percentage of total animal weight.

AD.name: Wiring group name
AD.description: Name of the group of components that will be wired together.

AD.name: Units for displaying blood weights
AD.description: Unit of measurement for blood weights.

AD.name: Alarm command
AD.description: TruTest command to use for turn on the audible alarm. The integer in the command determines the time duration of the audible.

AD.name: Alarm interval in seconds
AD.description: Time in seconds between audible alarms.

AD.name: BW multiplier
AD.description: Ratio of actual animal weight to calculated blood weight.

AD.name: Animal to BW percent trigger for alarm
AD.description: Ratio of actual blood weight to calculated blood weight that triggers alarming.

AD.name: Animal weight calculation threashold
AD.description: The weight of animal in kilograms that will trigger the calculating of blood weights. This value prevents negative scale weights from display erroneous values.

AD.name: Actual BW field
AD.description: TruTest command that identifies the field for displaying Actual BW

AD.name: Calc BW field
AD.description: TruTest command that identifies the field for displaying Calc BW

AD.name: Stop production after Record
AD.description: If true a record key press will stop the production of ActBW and CalcBW. Calculation will resume at zeroing of animal weight.
